en.seoTitle: Macro Calculator - What Are My Daily Macro Needs?
en.metaDescription: Use our free macro calculator to determine your daily protein, carbs, and fat intake based on your fitness goals and lifestyle.
en.keywords: macro calculator, macronutrient calculator, IIFYM calculator, calorie and macro calculator
en.longTailKeywords: macro calculator free, calculate macros for weight loss, macro calculator for muscle gain
en.description: Calculate your ideal daily macronutrient split tailored to your fitness goals, metabolism, and lifestyle.
en.summary: Determine your daily protein, carbohydrate, and fat requirements for optimal fitness results.
instructions: Enter your age, weight, height, and gender
Select your activity level
Choose your fitness goal
View your personalized macronutrient breakdown
Adjust portions to suit your preferences

seoContent.introduction: Proper nutrition is essential for achieving your fitness goals. Our macro calculator helps you determine the right balance of proteins, carbohydrates, and fats for your specific needs. Whether you're trying to lose weight, build muscle, or maintain your current physique, understanding your macro targets is crucial.
seoContent.benefits: Personalized nutrition plan, Optimized protein intake for muscle gain, Proper carb timing for energy, Balanced fat intake for health, Track your nutrition easily, Achieve fitness goals faster
seoContent.steps: 1. Enter your personal details (age, weight, height, gender). 2. Select your activity level (sedentary, lightly active, moderately active, very active). 3. Choose your goal (lose weight, maintain, build muscle). 4. Review your calculated macros. 5. Adjust based on your preferences and track daily.
seoContent.inputsExplained: Age: Your current age in years. Weight: Your body weight in pounds or kilograms. Height: Your height for BMI calculations. Activity Level: How often you exercise per week. Goal: Your primary fitness objective.
seoContent.formulaExplanation: The calculator uses the Mifflin-St Jeor equation to calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR), then multiplies by your activity factor. Macros are then distributed: 30-35% protein, 40-50% carbs, 25-30% fats depending on your goal.
seoContent.examples: Example: A 170lb man, 5'10", exercising 4x/week with a muscle gain goal would need approximately 2800 calories with 210g protein, 280g carbs, 93g fat. Example: A 130lb woman, 5'4", lightly active with weight loss goal needs around 1800 calories with 135g protein, 180g carbs, 60g fat.
seoContent.resultsExplanation: Your results show daily calorie needs and macro breakdown. Use these numbers to plan meals and track your nutrition using apps like MyFitnessPal.
seoContent.whoItsFor: Fitness enthusiasts, Bodybuilders, Weight loss seekers, Athletes, People meal planning, Anyone tracking nutrition
seoContent.disclaimer: This calculator provides estimates based on standard formulas. Individual needs may vary based on metabolism, medical conditions, and medications. Consult with a registered dietitian for personalized nutrition advice.
seoContent.relatedTools: TDEE Calculator, Calorie Calculator, BMI Calculator, Body Fat Calculator, Meal Plan Calculator

faqs.question: What are macronutrients?
faqs.answer: Macronutrients are protein, carbohydrates, and fats - the three main nutrients your body needs for energy and function.

faqs.question: How do I use the macro results?
faqs.answer: Use these targets to plan your meals, track with fitness apps, and adjust based on progress toward your goals.

faqs.question: Can I adjust my macros?
faqs.answer: Yes! These are starting points. Adjust based on your hunger levels, energy, and progress.

faqs.question: What's the best macro split?
faqs.answer: It depends on your goals. For weight loss, higher protein helps preserve muscle. For endurance, higher carbs fuel activity.

faqs.question: Do I need to hit exact numbers?
faqs.answer: No, aim for ranges within 5-10g. Perfect accuracy isn't necessary for results.

es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Macros - ¿Cuáles Son Mis Necesidades Diarias de Macros?
es.metaDescription: Usa nuestra calculadora de macros gratuita para determinar tu ingesta diaria de proteínas, carbohidratos y grasas.
es.keywords: calculadora de macros, calculadora de macronutrientes, macros para adelgazar, macros para ganancia muscular
es.longTailKeywords: calculadora de macros gratis, calcular macros para pérdida de peso, calculadora macros ganancia muscular
es.description: Calcula tu división ideal diaria de macronutrientes personalizada para tus objetivos fitness.
es.summary: Determina tus requerimientos diarios de proteínas, carbohidratos y grasas para resultados fitness óptimos.
instructions: Ingresa tu edad, peso, altura y género
Selecciona tu nivel de actividad
Elige tu objetivo fitness
Ve tu desglose de macronutrientes personalizado
Ajusta las porciones a tus preferencias

seoContent.introduction: La nutrición adecuada es esencial para lograr tus objetivos fitness. Nuestra calculadora de macros te ayuda a determinar el equilibrio correcto de proteínas, carbohidratos y grasas.
seoContent.benefits: Plan de nutrición personalizado, Ingesta de proteína optimizada, Carbohidratos en el momento correcto, Ingesta equilibrada de grasas, Seguimiento fácil de nutrición
seoContent.steps: 1. Ingresa tus datos personales. 2. Selecciona tu nivel de actividad. 3. Elige tu objetivo. 4. Revisa tus macros calculados. 5. Ajusta según tus preferencias.
seoContent.inputsExplained: Edad: Tu edad actual. Peso: Tu peso corporal. Altura: Tu altura. Nivel de Actividad: Cuántas veces ejercitas por semana. Objetivo: Tu objetivo fitness principal.
seoContent.formulaExplanation: La calculadora usa la ecuación Mifflin-St Jeor para calcular tu Tasa Metabólica Basal (TMB).
seoContent.examples: Ejemplo: Un hombre de 170 libras, 5'10", ejercitándose 4 veces a la semana con objetivo de ganancia muscular necesitaría aproximadamente 2800 calorías.
seoContent.resultsExplanation: Tus resultados muestran tus necesidades calóricas diarias y desglose de macros.
seoContent.whoItsFor: Entusiastas del fitness, Culturistas, Personas que buscan perder peso, Atletas, Personas planificando comidas
seoContent.disclaimer: Esta calculadora proporciona estimaciones. Las necesidades individuales pueden variar. Consulta con un nutriólogo registrado.
seoContent.relatedTools: Calculadora de TDEE, Calculadora de Calorías, Calculadora de IMC

faqs.question: ¿Qué son los macronutrientes?
faqs.answer: Los macronutrientes son proteína, carbohidratos y grasas - los tres nutrientes principales que tu cuerpo necesita.

faqs.question: ¿Cómo uso los resultados de macros?
faqs.answer: Usa estos objetivos para planificar comidas y rastrear con aplicaciones de fitness.

seoContent.introduction: A nutrição adequada é essencial para alcançar seus objetivos de fitness. Nossa calculadora de macros ajuda você a determinar o equilíbrio correto de proteínas, carboidratos e gorduras.
seoContent.benefits: Plano de nutrição personalizado, Ingestão de proteína otimizada, Carboidratos no momento certo, Ingestão equilibrada de gordura
seoContent.steps: 1. Digite seus dados pessoais. 2. Selecione seu nível de atividade. 3. Escolha seu objetivo. 4. Revise seus macros calculados. 5. Ajuste conforme suas preferências.
seoContent.inputsExplained: Idade: Sua idade atual. Peso: Seu peso corporal. Altura: Sua altura. Nível de Atividade: Quantas vezes você se exercita por semana. Objetivo: Seu objetivo de fitness principal.
seoContent.formulaExplanation: A calculadora usa a equação Mifflin-St Jeor para calcular sua Taxa Metabólica Basal (TMB).
seoContent.examples: Exemplo: Um homem de 77 kg, 1,78m, se exercitando 4 vezes por semana com objetivo de ganho muscular precisaria de aproximadamente 2800 calorias.
seoContent.resultsExplanation: Seus resultados mostram suas necessidades calóricas diárias e divisão de macros.

faqs.question: O que são macronutrientes?
faqs.answer: Macronutrientes são proteína, carboidratos e gordura - os três principais nutrientes que seu corpo precisa.

faqs.answer: Use esses objetivos para planejar refeições e rastrear com aplicativos de fitness.

fr.seoTitle: Calculatrice de Macros - Quels Sont Mes Besoins Quotidiens en Macros?
fr.metaDescription: Utilisez notre calculatrice de macros gratuite pour déterminer votre apport quotidien en protéines, glucides et lipides.
fr.keywords: calculatrice de macros, calculatrice de macronutriments, macros perte de poids
fr.longTailKeywords: calculatrice de macros gratuite, calculer les macros pour la perte de poids
fr.description: Calculez votre répartition quotidienne idéale de macronutriments personnalisée pour vos objectifs de fitness.
fr.summary: Déterminez vos besoins quotidiens en protéines, glucides et lipides pour des résultats de fitness optimaux.
instructions: Entrez votre âge, votre poids, votre taille et votre sexe
Sélectionnez votre niveau d'activité
Choisissez votre objectif de fitness
Consultez votre répartition personnalisée des macronutriments
Ajustez les portions selon vos préférences

seoContent.introduction: Une bonne nutrition est essentielle pour atteindre vos objectifs de fitness. Notre calculatrice de macros vous aide à déterminer le bon équilibre de protéines, glucides et lipides.
seoContent.benefits: Plan de nutrition personnalisé, Apport protéique optimisé, Glucides au bon moment, Apport équilibré en lipides
seoContent.steps: 1. Entrez vos données personnelles. 2. Sélectionnez votre niveau d'activité. 3. Choisissez votre objectif. 4. Examinez vos macros calculés. 5. Ajustez selon vos préférences.
seoContent.inputsExplained: Âge: Votre âge actuel. Poids: Votre poids corporel. Taille: Votre taille. Niveau d'Activité: Combien de fois vous vous exercez par semaine. Objectif: Votre objectif de fitness principal.
seoContent.formulaExplanation: La calculatrice utilise l'équation Mifflin-St Jeor pour calculer votre Taux Métabolique de Base (TMB).
seoContent.examples: Exemple: Un homme de 77 kg, 1,78m, s'entraînant 4 fois par semaine avec un objectif de gain musculaire aurait besoin d'environ 2800 calories.
seoContent.resultsExplanation: Vos résultats montrent vos besoins caloriques quotidiens et la répartition des macros.
seoContent.whoItsFor: Passionnés de fitness, Culturistes, Personnes cherchant à perdre du poids, Athlètes, Personnes planifiant des repas
seoContent.disclaimer: Cette calculatrice fournit des estimations. Les besoins individuels peuvent varier. Consultez un nutritionniste agréé.
seoContent.relatedTools: Calculatrice de TDEE, Calculatrice de Calories, Calculatrice d'IMC

faqs.question: Que sont les macronutriments?
faqs.answer: Les macronutriments sont les protéines, les glucides et les lipides - les trois nutriments principaux dont votre corps a besoin.

faqs.question: Comment utiliser les résultats des macros?
faqs.answer: Utilisez ces objectifs pour planifier vos repas et suivre avec des applications de fitness.
